markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Juvenile Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2653) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 137 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

You unfold your wings for travel and can keep them unfolded for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while your wings are unfurled. If you have [Fledgling Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2649), you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed with Juvenile Flight. As normal, since your fly Speed is derived from your land Speed, this status bonus isn't cumulative with a status bonus to your land Speed, if you have one.

<title level="2">Juvenile Flight leads to...</title>
[Fully Flighted](/Feats.aspx?ID=2657)
name: Juvenile Flight
